subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Jim Furyk eagled the second hole and made seven birdies to shoot a seven-under-par 63 and take the first-round lead in the Bridgestone Invitational on Thursday in Akron, Ohio.
snippet: Jim Furyk eagled the second hole and made seven birdies to shoot a seven-under-par 63 and take the first-round lead in the Bridgestone Invitational on Thursday in Akron, Ohio.
